content: **whispers of color crochet throw** - a mandala meadow crochet along welcome to the whispers of color crochet along this throw is designed as a celebration of nature s palette beginning with a centered mandala square radiating out in rounds of texture and hue inspired by a meadow of shifting leaves and changing seasons whether you join with bold colors or soft tones each stitch is a whisper of harmony and growth let s crochet a meadow together one round at a time > this pattern is available as a free > crochet along at the link provided **difficulty level | skills required** adventurous beginner to intermediate basic stitches in simple variations simple repeats color changes shaping and finishing you will need to know basic stitches like single_crochet single_crochet and double_crochet double_crochet special stitches explained and provided in the instructions **materials** hook 3 50 mm e & optional for gauge 4 00 mm g scissors yarn needle **yarn ** vinnis colours dk nikkim 100% cotton 50 grams/119 meters/130 yards weight dk 11 wpi 3 light approx 1150 grams / 2737 meters / 2990 yards a - natural x 5 b - baby yellow x 1 c - sunshine x 1 d - princess salmon x 2 e - nomvula s tangerine x 3 f - princess aqua x 3 g - kingfisher x 2 h - mint x 2 i - avocado x 4 **yarn substitute ** using the same type of yarn throughout the project is recommended the pattern suggests dk yarn weight dk 11 wpi 3 light worsted but you are not limited to this type of yarn any yarn can be used if you take into consideration your sizing for the project will differ **gauge | gauge** gauge is not necessary for this project to be perfect however counting your stitches will ensure a true success of this project **size** final blanket size including border - approx length and width = 121 x121 cm 48 x 48 inches remember if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your blanket will be a different size **abbreviations us terminology** **pattern support** full pattern support is available from the joanita theron designs facebook group or/and joanita theron designs ravelry group please post a question in the group and remember to tag me i will assist as soon as possible or one of my members will gladly jump in to help for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com
